azurerm_storage_blob.description: Manages a Blob within a Storage Container.

name.description: The name of the storage blob. Must be unique within the storage container the blob is located.

storage_account_name.description: Specifies the storage account in which to create the storage container.

storage_container_name.description: The name of the storage container in which this blob should be created.

type.description: The type of the storage blob to be created. Possible values are `Append`, `Block` or `Page`. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

size.description: Used only for `page` blobs to specify the size in bytes of the blob to be created. Must be a multiple of 512. Defaults to 0.

access_tier.description: The access tier of the storage blob. Possible values are `Archive`, `Cool` and `Hot`.

content_type.description: The content type of the storage blob. Cannot be defined if `source_uri` is defined. Defaults to `application/octet-stream`.

source.description: An absolute path to a file on the local system. This field cannot be specified for Append blobs and cannot be specified if `source_content` or `source_uri` is specified.

source_content.description: The content for this blob which should be defined inline. This field can only be specified for Block blobs and cannot be specified if `source` or `source_uri` is specified.

source_uri.description: The URI of an existing blob, or a file in the Azure File service, to use as the source contents

parallelism.description: The number of workers per CPU core to run for concurrent uploads. Defaults to `8`.

metadata.description: A map of custom blob metadata.

id.description: The ID of the Storage Blob.

create.description: Used when creating the Storage Blob.

update.description: Used when updating the Storage Blob.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Storage Blob.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Storage Blob.
